title: Namal’s wife, in laws leave country
body_lines: The wife of Minister Namal Rajapaksa, Limini Rajapaksa and her parents have left the country today morning, amidst rising public protests against the government, the Daily Mirror learns.
Limini Rajapaksa and her parents left the island for an undisclosed location, sources confirmed.
It is unclear if the other two daughters in law of Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa have also left the country.
